sentence.Network_en: " I know you, you scoundrel! I have heard of you before. You are Holmes, the meddler. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我知道你, 这个恶棍. 我以前听过你. 你是福尔摩斯, 爱管闲事的人. ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... meddle 干预 meddler 干预者 meddlesome 爱管闲事的.
meddler是什么意思|meddler的中文意思... ... meddler ： 爱管闲事的人 meddler ： 干涉者.
计算机英语 word - 豆丁网 ... lurk 潜伏， 埋伏 meddler 干涉者, 爱管闲事者 file encryption 文件加密.

entry.def: If you say that someone meddles in something, you are criticizing the fact that they try to influence or change it without being asked.

example.ex: Already some people are asking whether scientists have any right to meddle in such matters...
example.tran: 已经有人在问科学家是否有权干预这类事情。

example.ex: If only you hadn't felt compelled to meddle.
example.tran: 要是你没有觉得非插手不可就好了。

means.word_mean: 1. an officious annoying person who interferes with others

auth_sentence.content: We learn that Wagoner is aloof and excessively collegial and also a meddler.
auth_sentence.res_content: We learn that Wagoner is aloof and excessively collegial and also a meddler.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We learn that Wagoner is aloof and excessively collegial and also a meddler.
